images.caption: Figure 1:Overview of our agentic test-time scaling framework with four key strategies: (1)Parallel Sampling: BoN, BoN-wise, Beam Search, and DVTS;(2)Sequential Revision: Reflection model with threshold-driven re-generation;(3)Verifiers and Result Merging Methods: Scoring, list-wise, and majority voting;(4)Diversifying Rollouts: Sampling across heterogeneous agents.

Figure 2:A case study for ATTS: Given one question, the agent performs operations such as coding and tool calls during a single rollout, and returns diverse results. The judge agent will merge the final result and output the best answer.
Figure 3:Performance comparison of BoN and BoN-wise algorithms across different search sizes (1, 2, and 4).
